cd:Time.cd:Description: Start date and time of the SCA profile covered by the present DSR. This is the centroid time of the first measurement of the profile.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Index of the first matching bin
SCA QC flag about processed data: 1 if the first matching bin is clear; 0 else
Lowest (in altitude) bin processed by the SCA

cd:Record.cd:Description: Structure containing variances of SCA products bin per bin

cd:Float.cd:Description: Variance of the particle extinction coefficient retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the particle backscatter coefficient retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the particle lidar ratio retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the particle lidar ratio retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.

Index that characterizes the variability of the Rayleigh useful signal within one BRC. It is defined as the standard deviation of the Rayleigh useful signal within a BRC with respect to the Poisson noise.
Index that characterizes the variability of the Mie useful signal within one BRC. It is defined as the standard deviation of the Mie useful signal within a BRC with respect to the Poisson noise.
Variance of the LOD retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: QC information about processing (1=data valid, otherwise 0). Bit 1: Extinction, 2: Backscatter, 3: BER, 4: Mie SNR, 5: Rayleigh SNR, 6: Extinction error bar, 7: Backscatter error bar, 8: Cumulative LOD
Flag indicating the cloud contamination of each height bin (i.e. derived backscatter from AMD exceeding a defined threshold). Set to 1 for cloud contaminated bin, otherwise 0.

cd:Float.cd:Description: Rayleigh SNR processed by SCA and expressed in Rayleigh scale
Mie SNR processed by SCA and expressed in Rayleigh scale

cd:Record.cd:Description: Structure containing variances of SCA products as mean over two neighbouring bins

cd:Float.cd:Description: Variance of the particle extinction coefficient retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the particle backscatter coefficient retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the LOD retrieved by the SCA in this bin. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the backscatter-to-extinction ratio. Missing value: -1.
Variance of the extinction-to-backscatter ratio. Missing value: -1.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Flag indicating the cloud contamination of each height bin (i.e. derived backscatter from AMD exceeding a defined threshold). Set to 1 for cloud contaminated bin, otherwise 0.

Set to '0', '1', or '2': '0' the default Kray and Kmie values of the AUX_CAL file have been used. '1' the per orbit corrected in particle free conditions Kray and Kmie values have been calculated and used. '2' the per observation fitted Kray and Kmie values have been calculated and used.

cd:Float.cd:Description: Radiometric correction factor for the Rayleigh channel (calculated as indicated by the setting of field Radiometric_Correction_Performed)
Radiometric correction factor for the Mie channel (calculated as indicated by the setting of field Radiometric_Correction_Performed)
